tasks.label: Build dummy code for x86
args: mkdir -p target && ./btpc64macOS < dummy.pas > target/dummyX86Exec && chmod +x target/dummyX86Exec

tasks.label: Run dummy code built for x86
Disassemble dummy code built for x86 (full)
Disassemble dummy code built for x86 (short)
dependsOn: Disassemble dummy code built for x86 (full)

tasks.label: Print opcodes
args: mkdir -p target && ./btpc64macOS < btpc64macOSDebug.pas > target/btpc64macOSDebug && chmod +x target/btpc64macOSDebug && ./target/btpc64macOSDebug < dummy.pas > target/dummyExec.opcodes.txt

tasks.label: Build dummy code for aarch64
args: ./target/btpc64macosaarch64 < dummy.pas > target/dummyAarch64Exec && chmod +x target/dummyAarch64Exec && objdump -D target/dummyAarch64Exec > target/dummyAarch64Exec.asm && codesign --remove-signature target/dummyAarch64Exec && codesign --sign - target/dummyAarch64Exec

tasks.label: Disassemble dummy code built for aarch64
Build rtl64macOS binary
args: mkdir -p target && cd RtlConverter && as rtl64macOS.s -o ../target/rtl64macOS.o &&  ld -o ../target/rtl64macOS ../target/rtl64macOS.o -no_compact_unwind  -no_fixup_chains  -lSystem -syslibroot `xcrun -sdk macosx --show-sdk-path` -segprot __PAS rwx rx &&  chmod +x ../target/rtl64macOS

tasks.label: Generate stub.txt using RtlConverter
args: mkdir -p target && cd RtlConverter && java RtlConverter.java ../target/rtl64macOS ../target/stub.txt

tasks.label: Build compiler for aarch64
args: mkdir -p target && cp btpc64macOS.pas target/btpc64macOS.full.pas && RtlConverter/replace_stub.sh target/btpc64macOS.full.pas target/stub.txt && ./btpc64macOS < target/btpc64macOS.full.pas > target/btpc64macosaarch64 && chmod +x target/btpc64macosaarch64
